products.name: Spread Collar Non-Iron Henley Weave Shirt - White
products.desc: Meet our Shirt of the Season: the versatile Henley. Like its namesake, it's stylish, refined and always draws attention.
products.qdis: We named this dobby-textured weave shirt after the Royal Regatta, but you don't need to be on deck to enjoy it. With naturally stretchy, pure cotton fabric and mid-weight, it's a comfortable year-round choice for both the office and bar. You'll notice our signature details, like a smart spread collar, piping trim and tonal button attaches. Our non-iron finish ensures crease-free wear, while complimentary brass collar stays mean your look is sharp, straight out of the wardrobe.
